node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `messagechat` ( `messagechat_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `msgtext` char(255) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tstamp` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `room` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`messagechat_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: messagechat
